seccommerce.secsignersigg
Class SignatureRecord

java.lang.Object
  seccommerce.secsignersigg.SignatureRecord
All Implemented Interfaces:
java.io.Serializable, seccommerce.pkcs.ocsp.OcspResponseProvider
public class SignatureRecord
extends java.lang.Object
implements java.io.Serializable, seccommerce.pkcs.ocsp.OcspResponseProvider

A document together with its signature, its timestamp, file names and other parameters for either signature creation or verification.

Version:
$Id: SignatureRecord.java,v 1.16 2015/04/01 14:52:44 tk Exp $
Author:
SecCommerce Informationssysteme GmbH, Hamburg
See Also:

          Gets the padding method for RSA signatures.
 boolean isUseLegacyBmuXmlSigFormat()
          Returns whether redundant signer information as separate XML nodes for waste signatures (BMU ZKS) shall be added to the signature and whether the signature shall conform to an old XAdES version where SigningCertificate and SignerRole still have version 1.

setIncludeSignatureIntoPDF

public void setIncludeSignatureIntoPDF(java.lang.Boolean includeSignatureIntoPDF)
Decides whether the signed data are included in the SignedData structure. Overwrites the default of the batch. (default = false)

Parameters:
includeSignatureIntoPDF - true if include signed data into PDF

getIncludeSignatureIntoPDF

public java.lang.Boolean getIncludeSignatureIntoPDF()
Decides whether the signature is included into the PDF file ('PDF signature'). Overwrites the default of the batch. (default = false)

Returns:
true if include the signed data

setIncludeSignersCertificate

public void setIncludeSignersCertificate(java.lang.Boolean includeSignersCertificate)
Decides whether the signed data include the signer's certificate. Overwrites the default of the batch. (default = true)

Parameters:
includeSignersCertificate - if true include the signed data

getIncludeSignersCertificate

public java.lang.Boolean getIncludeSignersCertificate()

Returns:
true if include the signed data

signatureID - the signature ID which can be embedded into the signature

setXmlDSigNameSpaceName

public void setXmlDSigNameSpaceName(java.lang.String xmlDSigNSName)
Sets the namepacename to XML-DSig signature node. The URI is http://www.w3.org/2000/09/xmldsig#.

Parameters:
xmlDSigNSName - name space name

getXmlDSigNameSpaceName

public java.lang.String getXmlDSigNameSpaceName()
Gets the namepacename to XML-DSig signature node. The URI is http://www.w3.org/2000/09/xmldsig#.

Returns:
name space name

Sets the path to XML-DSig signature node. In signing mode this is only the path to the parent of the to be created signature node.

Parameters:
xmlDSigNodePath - path to the signature node

path to the signature node

setUseLegacyBmuXmlSigFormat

public void setUseLegacyBmuXmlSigFormat(boolean useLegacyBmuXmlSigFormat)
Determines whether redundant signer information as separate XML nodes for waste signatures (BMU ZKS) shall be added to the signature and whether the signature shall conform to an old XAdES version where SigningCertificate and SignerRole still have version 1.

Parameters:
useLegacyBmuXmlSigFormat - true to add redundant signer information only for BMU ZKS waste signatures

isUseLegacyBmuXmlSigFormat

public boolean isUseLegacyBmuXmlSigFormat()
Returns whether redundant signer information as separate XML nodes for waste signatures (BMU ZKS) shall be added to the signature and whether the signature shall conform to an old XAdES version where SigningCertificate and SignerRole still have version 1.

Returns:
true to add redundant signer information only for BMU ZKS waste signatures

setPssPadding

Parameters:
pssPadding - true for RSA-PSS padding, false for PKCS#1 v1.5 or ECC

isPssPadding

public boolean isPssPadding()
Gets the padding method for RSA signatures.

Returns:
true for RSA-PSS padding, false for PKCS#1 v1.5 or ECC

getDeepCopy

public SignatureRecord getDeepCopy()
                            throws SecSignerException
Creates a deep copy of this SignatureRecord instance. This copy is done by copying every instance variable instead of using ObjectOutputStream and ObjectInputStream. The reason is when using ObjectInput/OutputStream the memory usage is 4 times more than the data of the instance variables

Returns:
a deep copy of this object
Throws:
SecSignerException - if the copy failed

copyValues

public void copyValues(SignatureRecord otherSigRecord)
Copies the values of the instance variables of the specified signature record into the instance variables of this signature record.

Parameters:
otherSigRecord - the signature record whose values will overwrite the values of this signature record
